title: 【Student Dormitory】Explanation of Bank of Taiwan’s Integration Adjustment Operation for Dormitory Related Payment Slips during the Summer Break of the 113 Academic Year
author: 陳怡秀
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6212
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】Explanation of Bank of Taiwan’s Integration Adjustment Operation for Dormitory Related Payment Slips during the Summer Break of the 113 Academic Year
日期： Wed, 5 Jun 2024 10:17:21 +0800

Dear students,

Due to the integration operation of Bank of Taiwan's fee system for dormitory-related fees on the Bank of Taiwan Student Fee Portal during the summer break of the 113th academic year, please enter "1133" in the Taiwan Bank collection category to view dormitory-related fees after the summer break of the 113th academic year. For dormitory-related fees before the summer break of the 113th academic year, please continue to enter "1194" for inquiries.

Instructions for entering Taiwan Bank collection categories:
	For dormitory fees after the summer break of the 113th academic year, please enter "1133".
	For dormitory fees before the summer break of the 113th academic year, please enter "1194".

Best regards,
Student Living Service Division
